caption.p: West Nile Virus infections: projected future distribution in Europe. Projected probability of districts with West Nile Virus infections for 2025 ( a) and 2050 ( b), based on July temperatures for A1B scenario projections (a scenario of rapid economic growth, global population peaking by mid-21st Century, and rapid introduction of new and more efficient energy technologies). Source: (Semenza etÂ al. 2016).
